p: In a similar way, three oleanane type triterpenoids; euphorimaoid A and euphorimaoid B, were reported from the aerial parts of E. pulcherrima [ 55]. Other unique nor-triterpenoid isolated from E. soongarica and, which shared a tetracyclic ring with a euphane triterpenoid is (+)-( 24S)-eupha-8,25-diene-3Î²,24-diol-7-one ( 32). However, they only differ in the C-17 side-chain moiety. Sooneuphanone D and soonoleanone were also isolated from the root extracts of this species [ 56]. Likewise, the investigation of E. alatavica by Rushangul et al. [ 57] resulted in the isolation of nine compounds, including alatavolide and alatavoic acid reported for the first time.
